00054 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController(double positionGainTranslation,
00055         double velocityGainTranslation,
00056         double positionGainRotation,
00057         double velocityGainRotation,
00058         double positionToleranceTranslation,
00059         double velocityToleranceTranslation,
00060         double positionToleranceRotation,
00061         double velocityToleranceRotation) {
00062 
00063     actualTime = 0;
00064  
00065     tolerance = Odometry(Pose2D(positionToleranceTranslation,
00066             positionToleranceTranslation,
00067             positionToleranceRotation),
00068             Twist2D(velocityToleranceTranslation,
00069             velocityToleranceTranslation,
00070             velocityToleranceRotation));
00071 
00072     gains = Odometry(Pose2D(positionGainTranslation,
00073             positionGainTranslation,
00074             positionGainRotation),
00075             Twist2D(velocityGainTranslation,
00076             velocityGainTranslation,
00077             velocityGainRotation));
00078 
00079     resetFlags();
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController() {
00084     actualTime = 0;
00085     tolerance = Odometry(Pose2D(0.1, 0.1, 0.05));
00086 
00087     resetFlags();
00088 }

00090 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController(const OmniDrivePositionController& orig) :
00091 targetTrajectory(targetTrajectory) {
00092 
00093     actualTime = 0;
00094     tolerance = orig.getTolerance();
00095 
00096     targetOdometry = orig.getTargetOdometry();
00097     translationFlag = orig.translationFlag;
00098     rotationFlag = orig.rotationFlag;
00099 
00100 }

00103

00106 void OmniDrivePositionController::resetFlags() {
00107     translationFlag = false;
00108     rotationFlag = false;
00109 }

00119 void OmniDrivePositionController::setTargetTrajectory(const TrajectoryWithId& trajectory) {
00120     resetFlags();
00121 
00122     targetTrajectory.setTrajectory(trajectory.getTrajectory());
00123     targetTrajectory.id = trajectory.id;
00124 
00125 }

00130 
00131 bool OmniDrivePositionController::isTargetReached() const {
00132 
00133     return translationFlag && rotationFlag;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void OmniDrivePositionController::targetReached(bool& translation, bool& rotation) {
00137 
00138     KDL::Trajectory& trajectoryComposite = targetTrajectory.getTrajectory();
00139 
00140     double duration = trajectoryComposite.Duration();
00141     KDL::Frame frame = trajectoryComposite.Pos(duration);
00142 
00143     double roll, pitch, yaw;
00144     frame.M.GetRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
00145 
00146     Pose2D desiredPose(frame.p.x(), frame.p.y(), yaw);
00147     Pose2D actualPose = actualOdometry.getPose2D();
00148 
00149     double angDist = getShortestAngle(desiredPose.getTheta(), actualPose.getTheta());
00150     double linDist = getDistance(desiredPose, actualPose);
00151 
00152     translation = false;
00153     rotation = false;
00154 
00155     if (linDist <= tolerance.getPose2D().getX() && linDist <= tolerance.getPose2D().getY()) {
00156         translation = true;
00157     }
00158 
00159     if (fabs(angDist) <= tolerance.getPose2D().getTheta()) {
00160         rotation = true;
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 const Odometry& OmniDrivePositionController::computeNewOdometry(const Odometry& actualOdometry, double elapsedTimeInSec) {
00165 
00166 
00167     KDL::Trajectory& trajectoryComposite = targetTrajectory.getTrajectory();
00168 
00169     this->actualOdometry = actualOdometry;
00170     computedOdometry = Odometry();
00171 
00172     if (trajectoryComposite.Duration() > 0 && !isTargetReached()) {
00173   
00174         actualTime = elapsedTimeInSec;
00175 
00176         KDL::Frame desiredPose = trajectoryComposite.Pos(actualTime);
00177         KDL::Twist desiredTwist = trajectoryComposite.Vel(actualTime);
00178         KDL::Frame initPose = trajectoryComposite.Pos(0);
00179 
00180         double r, p, y;
00181         desiredPose.M.GetRPY(r, p, y);
00182 
00183         Odometry desiredOdometryGlobal(Pose2D(desiredPose.p.x(),
00184                 desiredPose.p.y(),
00185                 actualOdometry.getPose2D().getTheta()),
00186                 Twist2D(desiredTwist.vel.x(),
00187                 desiredTwist.vel.y(),
00188                 desiredTwist.rot.z()));
00189 
00190         Odometry desiredOdometryLocal;
00191 
00192         Odometry actualOdometryGlobal(actualOdometry);
00193         Odometry actualOdometryLocal;
00194 
00195         OmniDriveKinematicsModel omnidrive;
00196         omnidrive.convertToLocalReferenceFrame(desiredOdometryGlobal, desiredOdometryLocal);
00197         omnidrive.convertToLocalReferenceFrame(actualOdometryGlobal, actualOdometryLocal);
00198 
00199         double dPosX = desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getX();
00200         double dPosY = desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getY();
00201         double dPosTheta = y; //desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getTheta();
00202 
00203         double dVelX = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getX();
00204         double dVelY = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getY();
00205         double dVelTheta = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getTheta();
00206 
00207         double aPosX = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getX();
00208         double aPosY = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getY();
00209         double aPosTheta = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getTheta();
00210 
00211         double positionXError = dPosX - aPosX;
00212         double positionYError = dPosY - aPosY;
00213         double positionThetaError = getShortestAngle(dPosTheta, aPosTheta);
00214 
00215         double gainPosX = gains.getPose2D().getX();
00216         double gainPosY = gains.getPose2D().getY();
00217         double gainPosTheta = gains.getPose2D().getTheta();
00218 
00219         double gainVelX = gains.getTwist2D().getX();
00220         double gainVelY = gains.getTwist2D().getY();
00221         double gainVelTheta = gains.getTwist2D().getTheta();
00222 
00223         double errorTheta = gainVelTheta * dVelTheta + gainPosTheta * positionThetaError;
00224         double errorX = gainVelX * dVelX + gainPosX * positionXError;
00225         double errorY = gainVelY * dVelY + gainPosY * positionYError;
00226 
00227         computedOdometry.setTwist2D(Twist2D(errorX, errorY, errorTheta));
00228     }
00229 
00230     return computedOdometry;
00231 }
00232 
00233 float OmniDrivePositionController::getShortestAngle(float goalAngle, float actualAngle) {
00234     return atan2(sin(goalAngle - actualAngle), cos(goalAngle - actualAngle));
00235 }
00236 
00237 float OmniDrivePositionController::getDistance(const Pose2D& actualPose, const Pose2D& goalPose) {
00238     return sqrt((actualPose.getX() - goalPose.getX()) * (actualPose.getX() - goalPose.getX()) +
00239             (actualPose.getY() - goalPose.getY()) * (actualPose.getY() - goalPose.getY()));
00240 }
00241 
00242 void OmniDrivePositionController::setTolerance(const Odometry& tolerance) {
00243     this->tolerance = tolerance;
00244 }
00245 
00246 const Odometry& OmniDrivePositionController::getTolerance() const {
00247     
00248     return tolerance;
00249 }
